title: League of legends wont open. Windows 10
body: When i click to open league of legends the logo will appear for a couple seconds and then it will dissapear and nothing will happen, i tried reinstalling it, and after that i tried looking for some guides, but in all the guides the contents of the league folders where different from mine, im getting pretty tired of this, does someone know how to fix this? please?, oh, and if this helps, im using windows 10.

replies.body:
Could you try this, and let me know if it helps?
 - Find your LeagueClient.exe executable (default location is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)
 - Run it as an administrator (right-click on it, and the option should be there)

If this doesn't resolve it, try the same with the "lol.launcher.admin.exe" executable.
Nope, that does not fix it, and as Argo said, i don't have said "lol.launcher.admin.exe" what can i do?

> [{quoted}](name=DontPlayVarusPls,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZssEpeG2,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-03-09T17:05:52.629+0000)
>
> Nope, that does not fix it, and as Argo said, i don't have said "lol.launcher.admin.exe" what can i do?

Weird. Well, let's try the executables in the RADS folder. Two choices:
 - For me, it's at "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher\releases\0.0.1.68\deploy", and the filename is "LoLLauncher.exe"
 - The other option is "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.129\deploy", and the filename is "LeagueClient.exe"

For both, try running as admin. Also, before trying each one, verify that there is no LoL process running in Task Manager (you get there with Ctrl+Shift+Esc)

(note: the numbers in the above folders, should always be the latest ones available to you, at the time)

i sometimes have the same problem if i open the client and then open the browser. The client will  not open, the logo yes but not the client. To open it 100% i have to click on it and wait for the client window to come out

I'm having this exact same issue, and nothing I've seen suggested has worked (including Sinayion's suggestions above); even running the HRT hasn't worked (and that includes running it a second time doing a clean uninstall/reinstall). I have LeagueClient.exe running as administrator, and lol.launcher.admin.exe does not exist for me. This is getting very frustrating since it was working fine before the 8.5 patch.
